title: Open Data & Transparency Policy
description: Publish all public datasets, decisions, and rationales openly by default unless specifically exempted by law. Provide clear processes for requesting information.

title: Vision Zero Safety Commitment
description: Design and maintain streets to safely accommodate all users including pedestrians, cyclists, transit riders, and motorists of all ages and abilities.

title: Climate Equity Action Plan
description: Achieve net-zero community-wide greenhouse gas emissions by 2040 while ensuring climate benefits reach all communities equitably.

title: Participatory Budgeting Program
description: Engage residents directly in allocating a portion of the city budget to community-identified projects and priorities.

title: Zero Waste Goal by 2040
description: Divert 90% of materials from landfills by 2040 through comprehensive waste reduction, reuse, and recycling programs.

title: Affordable Housing Priority
description: Ensure all Austin residents have access to safe, affordable housing options regardless of income level or background.

title: Transit-First Mobility Strategy
description: Prioritize public transit, walking, and cycling as the preferred modes of transportation for daily trips.

title: Digital Inclusion & Access
description: Ensure all residents have access to high-speed internet, digital literacy training, and technology resources.

title: Parks & Recreation Access
description: Provide equitable access to parks, trails, and recreational facilities within a 10-minute walk of all residents.

title: Community Engagement Standard
description: Engage residents in decision-making processes that affect their neighborhoods through multiple accessible channels.
